LANDING.DESCRIPTION: I’m Giuseppe Cino, a frontend developer based in Saarlouis, Germany. I enjoy bringing ideas to life.

ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_I: I have a solid foundation in various programming languages and technologies. My strengths are particularly in frontend development, where I have gained experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Additionally, I have familiarized myself with frameworks such as Angular to create dynamic and responsive web applications.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_II: Problem-solving and creative thinking are also among my competencies, which I apply in every project to develop effective solutions.
ABOUT.TITLE: bout Me
ABOUT.TITLE_SUFFIX: Learning and Growth in the Digital World.

SKILLS.TITLE: kills
SKILLS.TITLE_DESCRIPTION: I possess solid analytical skills and problem-solving abilities, complemented by effective communication skills that facilitate smooth teamwork.

CATEGORY.CONTENT: Content Management System (CMS), Business, CRUD Application with Authentication
CATEGORY.LABEL: Category :

BLOG.DESCRIPTION: A modern blog and CMS project with Angular and Tailwind CSS in the frontend, and Node.js and Express.js in the backend, implementing a secure RESTful API with authentication, authorization, and CRUD functionality via Sequelize ORM and MySQL.
BLOG.TITLE: Blog & CMS

DAVVERO.DESCRIPTION: User-friendly restaurant website for reservations, menu displays, contact inquiries, and easy navigation.
DAVVERO.TITLE: Davvero

DABUBBLE.DESCRIPTION: A modern Slack clone that enables teams to communicate and collaborate in real time. It includes features such as chats, channels, and file sharing.
DABUBBLE.TITLE: DABubble

PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION: In my personal website, visitors can learn more about me, explore my projects, and get in touch with me to discuss potential collaborations or new opportunities.
PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Portfolio

JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag-and-drop features, assign users and categories.
JOIN.TITLE: Join

POLLO.DESCRIPTION: Jumping, running, and throwing game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe find coins and Tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy chicken.
POLLO.TITLE: El Pollo Loco

POKEDEX.DESCRIPTION: A simple library based on the Poké API that provides and catalogs Pokemon information.
POKEDEX.TITLE: Pokedex

PROJECTS.TITLE: rojects
PROJECTS.TITLE_DESCRIPTION: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently. They represent my journey in learning and applying new skills in different scenarios. I appreciate any feedback you might have.
